captcha.altchaCaptchaDescription: Based on proof-of-work mechanisms, Altcha Captcha employs a fundamentally new approach to securely defend your websites and online services from spam and bots.

label.altchaCaptchaWhitelistCustomers: No captcha for logged in customers

helpText.altchaCaptchaInvisible: The captcha is only displayed when it could not be verified automatically. Automatic verification is set to "onsubmit".
